reviewText: Jeff Bridges is a very good actor, and these three films just goes to  show you how talented he is. He may not be nominated for Oscars, or other awards every year, but you know his heart is in every film he does.
As expected.
Great movies
Great old movies that I haven't seen in a while.
I loved all these movies back in the day and they were fun to watch all over again.  The price was right.
Bought it for Starman; two other movies nice bonus.
Good movies.  I had seen them all a long time ago but were interesting to watch again.  I recommend all three of them.
Love these movies, great deal!
Love the packaged movies. Forgot that there was some offensive language in two of them. was able to share them with a neighbor
Great movies, Jeff Bridges does a great job. Great seller. Thanks.

I was surprised to find two of my favorite films combined on one dvd.  This will be a
treasured addition to my dvd collection.
Wonderful!
I GOT A GREAT DEAL !
Great DVD
Classic. . .
Bridges times three...a no-brainer!
Jagged Edge and Against All Odds (my favorites) Love Jeff Bridges anyway (LOL).  Have not looked at Starman yet.

love these 3 movies. Jeff at his best.
